original_title: Nightclub Shooting in Kiribathgoda Leaves Residents on Edge
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A nightclub shooting in the early hours of Monday (18) morning has shaken residents of Kiribathgoda and prompted an ongoing police investigation.
While no one was physically injured, the incident has left the community on edge.
Details remain scarce as the investigation progresses, but authorities confirmed the shooting occurred early in the morning at a nightclub located in the Gala Junction area.
Initial reports suggest the incident stemmed from a personal dispute, though the exact nature of it is still under investigation.
